title: Top Places to visit in Pulwama, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Pulwama is a city and a notified area council in Pulwama district, in India’s northern state of Jammu and Kashmir.It is 4th largest city in kashmir division and 6th largest city in state. It is almost 25 km (16 mi) from the summer capital of Srinagar. Pulwama is often called the "Anand of K
